there was a very large crowd assembled in the park .
signs were posted for the returning runners under the guise of a family reunion .
after the race | this runner grabbed a banner to wrap himself in .
output.sentences: It was the day they had all been waiting for.
The crowds cheered as the marathon runners flew by them.
Hundreds of people gathered in the park to celebrate the winners.
The marathon runners were greeted with hugs and gifts from family members.
It was a day no one was likely to forget very soon.
